snippet: The company deserves applause for its plan to impose strict standards on food advertising aimed at young children on Disney-owned television channels, radio stations and Web sites.
abstract: Editorial applauds the Walt Disney Company for its plan to impose strict standards on food advertising aimed at young children on Disney-owned television channels; asserts that eliminating junk-food commercials is a step toward addressing obesity among children and could set an example for other companies and advertisers to follow.
lead_paragraph: The company deserves applause for its plan to impose strict standards on food advertising aimed at young children on Disney-owned television channels, radio stations and Web sites.
